KW 0.6.0
  • Reference

    Performing CV using svm

    svm_cv.Rd

    Performing CV using svm

    Usage

    svm_cv(cv_obj)

    Arguments

    cv_obj

    outputs of the cvPartition function

    Author

    Kevin Wang

    Examples

    x = iris[51:150, -5]
y = factor(iris[51:150, 5])
cv_obj = cv_partition(x = x, y = y, nfolds = 5)
svm_cv(cv_obj)
#> $fold_error
#> Fold1 Fold2 Fold3 Fold4 Fold5 
#>  0.15  0.00  0.05  0.05  0.05 
#>
